alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 10:57AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A shower producing small hail will impact portions of east central Santa Cruz and central Santa Clara Counties through 1130 AM PDT... At 1056 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower producing small hail near Brown Valley Road, or near Corralitos, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Gilroy, Morgan Hill, Uvas Canyon Park, Eureka Canyon Road, San Martin and Day Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains
